title: Practitioner-Centered Workshop for Enhancing Digital Multimodal Composition Competencies

context.additional_context: Course focusing on acquiring digital multimodal composition skills for practical workplace application by current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design multimodal materials integrating text, images, sound, etc., in digital environments
Based on peer feedback, learners can revise and enhance their digital multimodal creations
Through phenomenological approaches, learners can analyze cognitive and affective elements experienced during digital multimodal composition

resources: Tablet PC or laptop (1 device per person)
Multimedia authoring tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Spark)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
